Cloudera | US, EMEA, APAC | Tech, Sales, Marketing | Full Time | Onsite

Working at Cloudera is about contributing toward the greater good. You’ll find we’ve been involved in some impressive initiatives, including helping establish a cloud-based collection and analysis tool that identified suspected human trafficking networks and individuals.

At Cloudera, we are passionate about creating a stimulating and supportive work environment for you. We strive to keep you healthy, happy and productive. We also offer comprehensive medical, dental and vision insurance plans, flexible savings accounts, 401(k) investment accounts and gym subsidy. Many employees work from home on Wednesdays, which are free from scheduled meetings so people can focus on getting things done. An exciting and dynamic public startup company with unique generous benefits!

We are growing fast and have openings in the Bay Area, Austin, all over the US and the world; in engineering, sales, support, marketing, product, HR and more.

Ready for a new and rewarding adventure? Check out our listings and apply here: https://goo.gl/5zCuS2
